nodes.text: Jari was a Togruta male who was a member of Saw Gerrera's Partisans.

Saw disposed of Jari at an Imperial barracks in an unknown location, under the pretense that Jari was leaking mission details to the Empire. In fact, Saw did this due to Jari knowing of Jyn Erso's identity as Galen Erso's daughter which might have put Jyn at risk.
